body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Ivory Tower in play.
2. Have less than 4 cards.
3. Lose life.

What is the expected output?
No effect (in accordance with [1]).

What do you see instead?
Losing life.

[1] http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=382978
author: [go.spam....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/113385897513702662113/)
title: Ivory Tower can damage owner

comments.body:
Fixed in revision e44ba99cbea1

**Status:** Fixed  
  **Owner:** ShawnieBoyUK
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have Ivory Tower in play.

What do you see instead?
